languages.text: "Что радуешься? Они и еретиков убивали, а теперь скверне, что затаилась среди нас, некому нести суровую кару Его".

traits.locale_text: "Что радуешься? Они и еретиков убивали, а теперь скверне, что затаилась среди нас, некому нести суровую кару Его".

languages.text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
languages.original_text: "Что радуешься? Они и еретиков убивали, а теперь скверне, что затаилась среди нас, некому нести суровую кару Его".

traits.locale_text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
"Don't look for convenience or an easy path. Don't pity yourself, and the Undying One will grant you a merciful demise."
"Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
"You should not seek a life of comfort and convenience, nor should you indulge in self-pity, If you suffer without complaint, the Undying One will grant you a merciful end."
"Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
"Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
"Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."
"Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."

languages.text: « Ne te réjouis pas trop vite. Ils se chargeaient aussi d'éliminer les hérétiques, et maintenant, il n'y a plus personne pour appliquer Sa divine sentence face à la corruption tapie dans nos rangs. »
languages.original_text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."

traits.locale_text: « Ne te réjouis pas trop vite. Ils se chargeaient aussi d'éliminer les hérétiques, et maintenant, il n'y a plus personne pour appliquer Sa divine sentence face à la corruption tapie dans nos rangs. »
« Tu ne devrais pas te complaire dans le confort ou la commodité ni t'apitoyer ainsi sur ton sort. Si tu souffres sans te plaindre, l'Immortel t'accordera une fin clémente. »

languages.text: «No se alegre tanto. También han matado herejes y ahora no hay nadie que lleve Su severo juicio ante la corrupción que nos rodea».
languages.original_text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."

traits.locale_text: «No se alegre tanto. También han matado herejes y ahora no hay nadie que lleve Su severo juicio ante la corrupción que nos rodea».
«No deberías buscar una vida cómoda y conveniente ni lamentarte por tu suerte. Si sufres sin quejarte, el Inmortal te concederá un final misericordioso».

languages.text: “别高兴得太早。他们杀的人里也包括异端分子。可现在，再也没有人能传达祂严厉的判决，消灭那些潜伏在我们之中的恶人了。”
languages.original_text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."

traits.locale_text: “别高兴得太早。他们杀的人里也包括异端分子。可现在，再也没有人能传达祂严厉的判决，消灭那些潜伏在我们之中的恶人了。”
“你不该追求舒适便利的生活，也不该总是自怨自艾。只要你勤勤恳恳地受苦，从不抱怨，不死之神必定会赐予你仁慈的结局。”

languages.text: 「喜びすぎないように。彼らは異端者も殺した。そして今、私たちの中に潜む腐敗に主の厳しい裁きを下す者は誰もいない」
languages.original_text: "Don't be too glad. They killed heretics too, and now there is no one to bring His stern judgement to the corruption that lurks in our midst."

traits.locale_text: 「喜びすぎないように。彼らは異端者も殺した。そして今、私たちの中に潜む腐敗に主の厳しい裁きを下す者は誰もいない」
「快適で便利な生活を求めず、自己憐憫に浸ってはならない。文句を言わずに苦しむなら、不滅の方は慈悲深い最期を与えてくださるだろう」

languages.text: "Strebt nicht nach einem Leben voll Bequemlichkeit und Komfort, und gebt Euch auch nicht dem Selbstmitleid hin. Wenn Ihr klaglos erduldet, so wird Euch der Todlose ein gnädiges Ende schenken."
languages.original_text: "You should not seek a life of comfort and convenience, nor should you indulge in self-pity. If you suffer without complaint, the Undying One will grant you a merciful end."

traits.locale_text: "Strebt nicht nach einem Leben voll Bequemlichkeit und Komfort, und gebt Euch auch nicht dem Selbstmitleid hin. Wenn Ihr klaglos erduldet, so wird Euch der Todlose ein gnädiges Ende schenken."
"Strebt nicht nach einem Leben voll Bequemlichkeit und Komfort, und gebt Euch auch nicht dem Selbstmitleid hin. Wenn Ihr klaglos erduldet, so wird Euch der Todlose ein gnädiges Ende schenken."
